entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 1:04PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...An Active Weather Pattern Returns to Southeast Alaska... The sunny and dry weather ends as an upper low develops over the Gulf midweek. Multiple surface lows are expected track towards the Panhandle during this time starting Tuesday night and continuing through the weekend.
